query.statement:
SELECT B.RECIPE_CLASS ,B.RECIPE_TYPE ,B.CUISINE_TYPE ,B.RECIPE_CD ,B.RECIPE_NAME ,COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM FMM_MENU A ,FMM_RECIPE B WHERE A.UPJANG = B.UPJANG AND A.MENU_CD = B.MENU_CD AND A.UPJANG IN ( SELECT UPJANG FROM FMS_UPJANG WHERE MAIN_UPJANG = #MAIN_UPJANG#
AND UPJANG = #UPJANG#
AND ( UPJANG = #g_Upjang# OR EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM FMS_USER_UPJANG B WHERE B.USE_YN = 'Y' AND B.UPJANG = A.UPJANG AND B.SABUN = #g_EmpNo#) )
) AND A.MENU_DATE BETWEEN #FROM_DT# AND #TO_DT#
AND B.RECIPE_NAME LIKE '%' || #RECIPE_NAME# || '%'
AND B.RECIPE_CLASS = #RECIPE_CLASS#
AND B.RECIPE_TYPE = #RECIPE_TYPE#
AND B.CUISINE_TYPE = #CUISINE_TYPE#
GROUP BY B.RECIPE_CLASS,B.RECIPE_TYPE,B.CUISINE_TYPE,B.RECIPE_CD,B.RECIPE_NAME ORDER BY B.RECIPE_CLASS,B.RECIPE_TYPE,B.CUISINE_TYPE,B.RECIPE_NAME
